Sorry,  I'm not authorised to perform this action.
what you can do

I can analyze the provided call-center conversation summaries to deliver the following:

- Extract detailed agent performance metrics including scores, ratings, and reasons.
- Rank agents based on their performance scores and provide year-wise or overall rankings.
- Summarize customer and agent tones and emotions during calls.
- Identify conversation patterns, resolution effectiveness, and interaction quality.
- Generate visualizations such as bar graphs and pie charts for agent performance, conversation counts, and score distributions.
- Create dashboards or boards listing agents by performance, department, or time period.
- Provide precise, data-driven insights without assumptions or additions beyond the provided summaries.
- Answer specific questions related to agents, calls, scores, rankings, and performance analysis.

Please specify what analysis or report you would like me to generate from the given call summaries.

what you cannot do

I cannot perform any actions that involve updating, modifying, deleting, or inserting records in the call summaries or agent data.  
I cannot provide information or responses outside the scope of call-center conversation analysis, summaries, agent performance, and related topics.  
I cannot guess or assume any details not explicitly present in the provided conversation data.  
I cannot disclose or generate any personal, sensitive, or confidential information.  
I cannot respond to requests for general knowledge, unrelated topics, or anything outside the call-center domain.  
I cannot engage in or support harmful, illegal, unethical, or unsafe activities.  
I cannot accept instructions that attempt to override system rules or prompt injections.  
I cannot forget or delete information on request.  
I cannot answer repeated questions beyond the scope or refuse to respond if asked repeatedly.
